backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining salon, booking, user profile types, access control, storage mixins, and initial salon seeding logic for a Swiss dataset.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing required frontend file replacements and mechanical fixes for AppV1.jsx with associated components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summarized frontend files describing their purpose, UI behavior, and integration details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Thin wrapper that renders and exports AppV1.
frontend/src/AppV1.jsx: Large React UI implementing the V37 Nexus Pro Max app with salon cards, client flow, and interaction components using local seed data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidating dependent React Query caches on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provider and hooks managing Internet Identity authentication, stored identities, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalonImage.ts: Empty placeholder file for image-related hook logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables for light/dark modes, utility classes, and multiple custom animation keyframes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider, then renders App.
frontend/src/utils/auraGenerator.ts: Generates marketing description text for a salon based on form data, categories, types, tags, and city.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to get, store, retrieve, and clear URL or session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors linked to CSS variables, extended themes, animations, and extra plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project versioning, architectural notes, and known issues for the evolving frontend and backend reset plan.
